name: Atic atac spectrum heroes
description:
Aticatac spectrum heroes

Before Rare there was Ultimate Play The Game and it was one of the few truly legendary game developers for the ZX Spectrum. Then again, you are surely aware of this as you are of the fact that Atic Atac was an elegant 8-bit masterpiece. A fantastic maze/action/puzzle game that has gracefully aged and, to get to this post's point, has also been beautifully remade. Grab said (Windows only) remake by Mick Farrow.
Tweak by returnlearn to feature Dizzy, manic miner and jetpac (Thinking to include a game music)
